sourcesContent:
export const Samples = [
    {
        id: 1,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/kadma.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/kadma.wav',
        heb: ' קַדְמָ֨א',
        eng: 'kadma'
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/mapach_pashta.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/mapach_pashta.wav',
        heb:  ' מַהְפַּ֤ך פַּשְׁטָא֙',
        eng: 'Mapach Pashta'
    },
    {
        id: 3,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/pashta.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/pashta.wav',
        heb: ' פַּשְׁטָא֙',
        eng: 'Pashta'
    },
    {
        id: 4,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/munach.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/munach.wav',
        heb: ' מֻנַּ֣ח',
        eng: 'Munach'
    },
    {
        id: 5,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/munach_zakef_katon.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/munach_zakef_katon.wav',
        heb: ' מֻנַּ֣ח זָקֵף קָטָ֔ן',
        eng: 'Munach Zakef Katon'
    },
    {
        id: 6,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/zakef_gadol.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/zakef_gadol.wav',
        heb:  ' זָקֵף גָּד֕וֹל',
        eng: 'Zakef Gadol'
    },
    {
        id: 7,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/etnachta.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/etnachta.wav',
        heb: ' אֶתְנַחְתָּ֑א',
        eng: 'Etnachta'
    },
    {
        id: 8,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/munach_etnachta.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/munach_etnachta.wav',
        heb:  ' מֻנַּ֣ח אֶתְנַחְתָּ֑א',
        eng: 'Munach Etnachta'
    },
    {
        id: 9,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/yetiv.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/yetiv.wav',
        heb:  ' יְ֚תִיב',
        eng: 'Yetiv'
    },{
        id: 10,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/darga_tvir.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/darga_tvir.wav',
        heb: ' דַּרְגָּ֧א תְּבִ֛יר ',
        eng: 'Darga Tvir'
    },
    {
        id: 11,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/mercha_tvir.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/mercha_tvir.wav',
        heb: ' מֵרְכָ֥א תְּבִ֛יר',
        eng: 'Mercha Tvir'
    },
    {
        id: 12,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/munach_revii.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/munach_revii.wav',
        heb: ' מֻנַּ֣ח רְבִ֗יע',
        eng: 'Munach Reviyi'
    },
    {
        id: 13,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/kadma_vazla.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/kadma_vazla.wav',
        heb:  ' קַדְמָ֨א וְאַזְלָא֜',
        eng: 'Kadma Vazla'
    },
    {
        id: 14,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/gershayim.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/gershayim.wav',
        heb: ' גֵּרְשַׁ֞יִם',
        eng: 'Gershayim'
    },
    {
        id: 15,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/mercha_tipcha.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/mercha_tipcha.wav',
        heb: ' מֵרְכָ֥א טִפְחָ֖א',
        eng: 'Mercha Tipcha'
    },
    {
        id: 16,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/pazer.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/pazer.wav',
        heb:  ' פָּזֵ֡ר',
        eng: 'Pazer'
    },
    {
        id: 17,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/tlisha_gdola.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/tlisha_ktana.wav',
        heb: ' תְּלִישָא קְטַנָּה֩',
        eng: 'Tlisha Ktana'
    },
    {
        id: 18,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/tlisha_ktana.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/tlisha_gdola.wav',
        heb:  ' תְּ֠לִישָא גְדוֹלָה',
        eng: 'Tlisha Gdola'
    },
    {
        id: 19,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/zarka_segol.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/munach_zarka_segol.wav',
        heb: ' מֻנַּ֣ח זַרְקָא֮ מֻנַּ֣ח סֶגּוֹל֒',
        eng: 'Munach Zarka Munach Segol'
    },
    {
        id: 20,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/sof_pasuk.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/sof_pasuk.wav',
        heb: " : סוֹף פָּסֽוּק",
        eng: 'Sof Pasuk'
    },
    {
        id: 21,
        checked: 1,
        image: "./images/sof_aliya.png",
        options: ['1', '2','3'],
        sound: './sounds/sof_aliya.wav',
        heb: ' | סוֹף עליה',
        eng: 'Sof Aliya'
    }
   
  ]

//   const allTropes = " קַדְמָ֨א מֻנַּ֣ח זַרְקָא֮ מֻנַּ֣ח סֶגּוֹל֒ מֻנַּ֣ח ׀ מֻנַּ֣ח רְבִ֗יע מַהְפַּ֤ך פַּשְׁטָא֙ זָקֵף־קָטָ֔ן זָקֵף־גָּד֕וֹל מֵרְכָ֥א טִפְּחָ֖א מֻנַּ֣ח אֶתְנַחְתָּ֑א פָּזֵ֡ר תְּלִישָא־קְטַנָּה֩ תְּ֠לִישָא גְדוֹלָה קַדְמָ֨א וְאַזְלָ֜א אַזְלָא־גֵּ֜רֵשׁ גֵּרְשַׁ֞יִם דַּרְגָּ֧א תְּבִ֛יר יְ֚תִיב פְּסִיק׀ מֵרְכָ֥א טִפְּחָ֖א מֵרְכָ֥א סוֹף פָּסֽוּק׃ שַׁלְשֶׁ֓לֶת מֵרְכָא כְּפוּלָ֦ה יֵרֶח בֶּן יוֹמ֪וֹ קַרְנֵי פָרָ֟ה׃  "
